There was a time when my heart beat so loudly for you, it felt like the whole world could hear it. But I was too shy, too afraid to let those words escape my lips. I held them close, thinking there would be another moment, another chance. But now, the distance between us feels like an endless winter, cold and silent. The warmth we once shared has faded, and the words I never said are now trapped in this icy space, unable to reach you. I still feel them, as strongly as ever, but the chill between us makes it impossible to speak. I wish I could turn back time, to that moment when my heart was full, and tell you everything I kept hidden.
